version_description:
PAUSE now has added support for iPad and iPad mini. We’ve also started localization of the app and translated it to a number of languages: French, Danish, Swedish, Italian, German, Spanish, Chinese, Russian and Japanese to be specific. On top of that, we’ve taken care of a few bugs, to make sure you have a smooth, relaxing experience.

In short:
– iPad and iPad mini support
– Localization
– Bug fixes

PAUSE now has added support for iPad and iPad mini. We’ve also started localization of the app and translated it to a number of languages: French, Danish, Swedish, Italian, German, Spanish, Chinese, Russian and Japanese to be specific. On top of that, we’ve taken care of a few bugs, to make sure you have a smooth, relaxing experience.

In short:
– iPad and iPad mini support
– Localization
– Bug fixes
Using PAUSE now adds mindfulness minutes to Health App on iPhone iOS10+ devices.
Using PAUSE now adds mindfulness minutes to Health App on iPhone iOS10+ devices.

Thanks for using PAUSE! We want to create the best PAUSE to help you quickly relax and regain energy. In this release, we added full-screen support and took care of a few bugs. All to make sure you have a smooth, relaxing experience.

In short:
- Full-screen support
- Bug fixes

If you have any questions, let us know at help@pauseable.com

Thanks for using Pause. In this release, we added Profile. We invite you to set up an account to see your stats, back up your data, and sync the data with your iPad. We hope you will enjoy it.

If you have any questions or feedback, please write us an email at help@pauseable.com.

Thanks for using Pause. In this release, we added Profile. We invite you to set up an account to see your stats, back up your data, and sync the data with your iPad. We hope you will enjoy it.

If you have any questions or feedback, please write us an email at help@pauseable.com.

We are happy to share with you a brand new experience called ⌜Resonance⌟. You will play with singing bowls to create beautiful sand mandalas. We hope you will enjoy it.

If you have any questions or feedback, please write us an email at help@pauseable.com.

We are happy to share with you a brand new experience called ⌜Resonance⌟. You will play with singing bowls to create beautiful sand mandalas. We hope you will enjoy it.

If you have any questions or feedback, please write us an email at help@pauseable.com.

Thanks for using Pause. In this release, we optimized the previous ⌜Sleep⌟ experience into ⌜Let go⌟. We want to help you let go of energy-draining negative feelings and thoughts whenever needed (rather than limiting them before sleeping). Meanwhile, we are working on a brand new ⌜Sleep⌟ experience.

If you have any feedback or questions, please write us an email at help@pauseable.com.

Dear users, thanks for using PAUSE. Based on your input, we are introducing a yearly subscription option at a 40% discount. We also added many more wisdom quotes and fixed several errors to improve the user experience.

If you have any questions or feedback, please write us an email at help@pauseable.com.

Thanks for using Pause. In this update, we fixed several issues:
- ⌜Finger Tai Chi⌟ mindfulness score ranking algorithm optimization
- ⌜Finger Tai Chi⌟ history page show past sessions correctly

If you have any questions or feedback, please write us an email at help@pauseable.com

We are proud to introduce ⌜Sleep⌟. It invites you to practice mindful tapping - an exercise that quickly slows down thoughts and triggers the body's relaxation response. We can't wait for you to try. 

We also unlocked the session analysis of ⌜Finger Tai Chi⌟ for all users for free, you can now see a detailed after session analysis of the speed and stability of your finger movement.

We hope you enjoy this update. If you have any questions or input, please write us an email at help@pauseable.com.

We hope you enjoy this update. If you have any questions or input, please write us an email at help@pauseable.com.

In this release, we added ⌜Share Pause⌟ feature at the bottom of the main menu, so you can easily send Pause to your loved ones. We also improved the overall performance and experience of the app.

If you have any questions or feedback, please write us an email at help@pauseable.com.

We are proud to introduce ⌜Breathe⌟, it lets you use your phone to accurately detect your breathing and provide real-time calming feedback. It's quite magical. We have decided to unlock the core features for both ⌜Breathe⌟ and ⌜Sleep⌟ to everyone. We hope you enjoy PAUSE 3.0

If you have any feedback or questions, please write us an email at help@pauseable.com

- Added breath rate detection to ⌜Breathe⌟
- Optimised color selection in ⌜Breathe⌟ and ⌜Sleep⌟
- ⌜Breathe⌟ integration with Apple HealthKit
